readme: # Grunt: The JavaScript Task Runner [![Build Status: Linux](https://secure.travis-ci.org/gruntjs/grunt.png?branch=master)](http://travis-ci.org/gruntjs/grunt) [![Built with Grunt](https://cdn.gruntjs.com/builtwith.png)](http://gruntjs.com/) ### Documentation Visit the [gruntjs.com](http://gruntjs.com/) website for all the things. ### Support / Contributing Before you make an issue, please read our [Contributing](http://gruntjs.com/contributing) guide. You can find the grunt team in [#grunt on irc.freenode.net](http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=grunt). ### Release History See the [CHANGELOG](CHANGELOG).
